sentences.en: But if it is detraction, you might feel horrible, and you may self-deprecation.
sentences.cn: 但如果那是诽谤，你会感觉很糟糕，你可能还会自我贬低。
人大招物议,树大惹风吹.

sentences.en: Envy has no other quality but that of detraction from virtue.
sentences.cn: 嫉妒除了毁损美德外,别无他用.

sentences.en: Envy has no other quality But that of detraction from virtue.
sentences.cn: 嫉妒除了损坏美德外,别无可取之处.

sentences.en: Faced with such detraction, scientists characteristically retort that science, unlike witchcraft, works.
sentences.cn: 面对诋毁, 科学家们出于天性给予反驳,宣称科学不是巫术, 确实有效.

sentences.en: Let it be no detraction from his merits to say he is plainspoken.
sentences.cn: 说他坦率的时候请别忘记他的那些优点.

sentences.en: Weak men are crushed by detraction, but the brave hold on and succeed.
sentences.cn: 贬抑只能压倒弱者, 勇者则能坚持到胜利.

trans.tran_en: a person, thing, circumstance, etc, that detracts
